name: Sokoban Of The Multiverse
description:
Description:

Solve block pushing puzzles by travelling between parallel dimensions. Discover many different mechanics to multidimensional travel through 14 handcrafted levels.

- Arrow keys to move.

 - A/D to change universe.

- Z to undo, R to restart.

- M to toggle music and K to toggle sound.

Download for free for windows. 

Made using C++ & SDL2.

 

CC0 asset attribution:

Game assets: https://github.com/sparklinlabs/superpowers-asset-packs https://pixel-boy.itch.io/ninja-adventure-asset-pack 

Font: https://opengameart.org/content/minimalist-pixel-fonts 

🎵 Track Info: 

Artist Name: Kevin MacLeod 

Song Title: Bit Bit Loop 

Contact the Artist: Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/kmacleod Twitter: https://twitter.com/kmacleod Website: https://incompetech.com/
